channel.title: transit on Greg Macfarlane
channel.description: Recent content in transit on Greg Macfarlane

item.title: There should be a UVX stop at Wasatch Elementary
item.description: I attended Wasatch Elementary school in Provo between fall 1989 when I enrolled in Mrs. Whitaker’s Kindergarten class and spring 1997, when I graduated from Mrs. Fossum’s sixth-grade class. I continued to live in the tree streets neighborhood through middle and high school, and really only moved away when I went to graduate school in Atlanta in 2010. Transit and safety
